newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine cash April maize up in moderate turnover.
newsitem.headline: Argentine cash April maize up in moderate turnover.

text.p: Argentine cash April maize rose in middling volume trade at the Buenos Aires Cereals Exchange, with the market disregarding a weaker Chicago in favor of longer-term bull influences, traders said.
International crop weather trends and other buying patterns could mean price rises, a trader said. Cash spot maize weakened in good volume, with some exporters selling.

Cash spot soybeans were mixed in heavy turnover, with crushers buying eagerly in Quequen and Buenos Aires amid plenty of supply. May soybeans were steady in moderate volume. January wheat firmed in middling turnover.
